title: Assassins Creed 4 Black flag version 1.06 + all dlc's repack Mr
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Assassins Creed IV Black Flag : Complete Edition.....
Contains all dlc campaigns and other contents.....

Repack features:

Do not cut / recoded
Final Game Version: 1.06
Precracked - install and play;
Install Time - 20 minutes [Quad core]
Final size: 23.9gb
Crack based on : 3DM
Operating system: Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit aand 64bit)

DLC included:
-Aveline (Campaign)
-Freedom Cry (Campaign)
-All dlc swords

With update 1.06, the nvidia Physx has been made more stable and can be changed to OFF,LOW,MEDIUM OR HIGH from Options in interface Menu. It won't show if your card doesn't support it. Enjoy the game in all it's glory. All the previous patches and updates are applied. All you have to do is install and play.......

Your savegames are located in 'save3dmgames' folder in install directory....

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch setup or may run it but with some glitches,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, play the game from desktop shortcut....

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,, GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......


LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
